import React, { useState } from 'react'; const LecturersSection = () => { const [lecturers, setLecturers] = useState([ { id: 1, name: 'Dr. Ishiepo', email: 'ishiepo@luct.ac.ls', courses: ['DIT', 'Web Development'], status: 'Active' }, { id: 2, name: 'Lereko', email: 'lerekoluct.ac.ls', courses: ['CS101'], status: 'Active' }, { id: 3, name: 'Prof. Rey', email: 'rey@luct.ac.ls', courses: ['IT901'], status: 'Active' } ]); return (
Lecturers Management
{lecturers.map(lecturer => ( ))}
Name Email Courses Status Actions
{lecturer.name} {lecturer.email} {lecturer.courses.join(', ')} {lecturer.status}
); }; export default LecturersSection;
